20110125064448.000|20110125064448.000|CC1|    SEVEN YEARS AGO,            
20110125064448.000|20110125064449.000|CC1|    I HAD THIS IDEA.            
20110125064449.000|20110125064449.000|CC1|    TO MAKE BABY FOOD           
20110125064449.000|20110125064451.000|CC1|    THE WAY MOMS WOULD.         
20110125064451.000|20110125064455.000|CC1|    HAPPYBABY STRIVES TO MAKETH.
20110125064455.000|20110125064457.000|CC1|    IN A BUSINESS LIKE OURS,    
20110125064457.000|20110125064457.000|CC1|    PERSONAL CONNECTIONS        
20110125064457.000|20110125064459.000|CC1|    ARE SO IMPORTANT.           
20110125064459.000|20110125064459.000|CC1|    WE USE OUR AMERICAN         
20110125064459.000|20110125064501.000|CC1|    EXPRESS OPEN GOLD CARD      
20110125064501.000|20110125064501.000|CC1|        TO FURTHER              
20110125064501.000|20110125064503.000|CC1|    THOSE CONNECTIONS.          
20110125064503.000|20110125064503.000|CC1|    LAST YEAR WE TOOK           
20110125064503.000|20110125064504.000|CC1|    DOZENS OF TRIPS             
20110125064504.000|20110125064504.000|CC1|    USING MEMBERSHIP            
20110125064504.000|20110125064506.000|CC1|    REWARDS POINTS TO MEET      
20110125064506.000|20110125064506.000|CC1|    WITH THE FARMERS THAT       
20110125064506.000|20110125064508.000|CC1|    GROW OUR SWEET POTATOES     
20110125064508.000|20110125064508.000|CC1|    AND MERCHANTS THAT          
20110125064508.000|20110125064510.000|CC1|    SELL OUR PRODUCT.           
20110125064510.000|20110125064510.000|CC1|    WE'VE GONE FROM BEING       
20110125064510.000|20110125064513.000|CC1|    IN 5 STORES TO 7,500.       
20110125064513.000|20110125064513.000|CC1|    BOOMING IS USING POINTS     
20110125064513.000|20110125064516.000|CC1|    TO MAKE CONNECTIONS         
20110125064516.000|20110125064709.000|CC1|    THAT GROW YOUR BUSINESS.

20110125064709.000|20110125064712.000|CC1|>>> WE ARE WATCHING A PIECE OF
